mean_cn: n.拉格泰姆音乐；  adj.不严肃的
mean_en: a type of lively music that is often played on the piano and that was very popular in the U.S. in the early part of the 20th century
sentence: Ragtime is a kind of jazz piano music with a two-four rhythm base.
sentence_trans: 拉格泰姆音乐是一种2/4拍的爵士钢琴乐。
word_etyma: rag嘲笑，捉弄+time时间 →  滑稽的；不严肃的
